subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The game was called after four and a half innings and a one-hour-37-minute rain delay, giving the Phillies a victory and narrowing the Mets' lead over Philadelphia in the National League East to three games.
snippet: The game was called after four and a half innings and a one-hour-37-minute rain delay, giving the Phillies a victory and narrowing the Mets' lead over Philadelphia in the National League East to three games.
